Name: Chased by Darkness
About the game: Your job is to face supernatural entities that are not from our world. Survive against enemies from the spirit underworld and perform banishments to send them back where they belong. Single player mode Do all the work alone. But be careful, any mistake will cost a lot. 2-4 player co-op Join with other players and work together to fight the darkness. Banish powerful spirits Face enemies and banish the spirits back to where they belong. Escalating difficulty Enemies will get faster and more aggressive as the game progresses. Level system Progress through the level system and unlock characters and new guns. Gameplay diversity Each map has its own characteristics and mechanics. Insane mode If you are looking for a challenge, the Insane mode was made for you. Faster, harder, crazier! Free major updates Chased by Darkness is regularly updated with free content. New maps, variety of enemies and new ways to play. WARNING This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
